<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Online Store
</h1>
<a href="https://gatsbyonlinestore.netlify.com/">Demo</a>

A simple Online Store created using the GatsbyJS framework. The app has basic eCommerce functions like category/product pages, search and cart. The app is a progressive web application with offline capabilities using service workers and several performance enhancements that comes baked into Gatsby framework.

## Tech Stack
1. ReactJS
2. GatsbyJS (Static site generator)
3. React-Redux (Store)
4. Ant Design (UI framework)
5. JS Search
6. Netlify (Hosting)

## Features
1. Progressive web app
2. Static/serverless website
3. Offline support with service workers
4. Image lazy loading
5. Client side search

## Installation
Install using `yarn install` or `npm install`.<br />
Install Gatsby CLI `npm install -g gatsby-cli`.

## Running The App
`gatsby develop` for local development.<br />
`gatsby build` for production build.
